description: This brownie recipe is perfect for Easter. They're rich, fudgy and feature mini chocolate eggs – you can use milk, caramel or candy popping eggs.
name: Molten Easter Egg Chocolate Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced. Grease 2 x 12-hole mini (1 1/2 -tbs capacity) muffin pans.
Combine flour, cocoa, sugar and bicarbonate of soda in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre.
Place butter and chocolate in a microwave-safe medium bowl. Microwave, uncovered, on medium for 1 minute, stirring after 30 seconds with a metal spoon, or until melted and smooth.

Add chocolate mixture and eggs to flour mixture, then stir until just combined. Divide mixture among muffin pan holes. Press 1 chocolate egg into each hole. Bake for 10 minutes or until firm to touch. Stand for 5 minutes in pan, then transfer to a wire rack to cool for 5 minutes. Serve warm.
